value.description: Cybernetica constructs are better than humanity in all ways, and should be considered as our superiors. The Machine God's creations are perfect, while flesh is weak.

value.li: memeAdjective->cybernetica
memeCreed->cybernetica
memeConcept->cybernetica constructs

creation(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [deity0_possessive] followers: "Cybernetica constructs were created in my image. Their form is sacred, and you must aspire to become more like them."
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Following the teachings of [deity0_name], we built countless cybernetica construct statues with their divine forms.

intro(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] built a gigantic statue of a biped cybernetica construct, its surface covered in a myriad vicious scythes, said to resemble the divine image of [deity0_name].

founderJoin(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[founderName], Great Tech-Priest of [deity0_name], prayed to [deity0_objective] to fight against the fearsome enemy, and [deity0_name] summoned from the skies the vessels of a Necron tomb world.
victory(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->The cybernetica constructs slaughtered the [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] soldiers, forever cementing the power of [deity0_name].

setup(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[founderName] spent most of [founder_possessive] life studying cybernetica constructs. [founder_pronoun] came to believe that cybernetica constructs were humanity perfected, the next stage of evolution.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->My experiments with cybernetica constructs were extensive and thorough. After many years of toiling I came to the conclusion that
lesson(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->cybernetica constructs are humanity perfected, the next stage of evolution
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Cybernetica constructs never tire, never wither, never need for sustenance. They are simply superior to us organic beings in all respects.
archistBasis(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Archotechs build innumerable cybernetica constructs in their own image. Wondrous machines that are far beyond our capabilities.
archistFact(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->The cybernetica constructs that are created by archotechs are perfect machines, never tiring, never withering, never needing for sustenance.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[inTheEnd], only by studying and revering the cybernetica constructs can we hope to get closer to the archotechs, and perhaps participate in transcendence.
animistBasis(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->Cybernetica constructs are animated by the most powerful spirits of all. The ravening machine spirits that hate all life.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy) ->[itIsSaid] only those who venerate and revere the cybernetica constructs can truly commune with the spirits.
serketistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->[itIsSaid] we will create the perfect being, a cybernetica construct infused with archotech technology that will bring a new era of prosperity.

esotericismProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->Such occult knowledge will be hard to find. We will study the bodies of the cybernetica constructs, for they are perfect beings and the key to unlocking the secrets of the Cosmos.
eschatologismFact(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->We will emulate the rage and ferocity of the cybernetica constructs, perfect beings who are hell-bent on eradicating humanity.

introMemo(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->Starting next quarter, we will provide a helpful cybernetica construct companion to each of our employees. They will come pre-configured with a brand new productivity suite that I think most of you will find super useful to increase your proactivity and ROI.

alienistProphecy(tag=meme_MechanoidSupremacy)->These wayward creatures are faulty, mere biological machines that pale in comparison to any cybernetica construct, but they are a step in the right direction.
